centerName: KIDS IN THE GAME SUMMER CAMP

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Required Fines pending

infractions.Violation Summary: All windows except fire escape and emergency access windows not provided with guards in camps with children less than 10 years of age
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined/observed that food service worker not provided with appropriate food thermometer during food prep
Adequate lighting not provided in food prep area at time of inspection Foods observed not protected from contamination from light fixture/bulb damage at time of inspection
